Text: Demons is the third studio album by American post-hardcore band Get Scared, released on October 30, 2015 via Fearless Records.

1: Built for Blame, Laced With Shame

--------------------
Text: Demons (Get Scared album):  The album marks a departure from previous releases, such as "Everyone's Out to Get Me" and "Built for Blame, Laced With Shame" in favor of a style reminiscent of the band's 2009 EP "Cheap Tricks and Theatrics" with metalcore elements mixed in.

--------------------
Text: Demons (Get Scared album):  "Demons" was produced with Erik Ron who also worked with the band on "Everyone's Out to Get Me" and "Built for Blame, Laced With Shame" and received positive reviews upon release.
